original: @155b // bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @155b // bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the Lord of the Wheel of Wisdom.

original: sngags pa yan lag drug rtsi bas drug /'khor lo 'bar ba dri ma med //
analyzed: sngags pa yan lag drug rtsi bas drug /'khor lo 'bar ba dri ma med //
translated: The mantra practitioner, considering the six limbs, the six wheels, the blazing, stainless wheel,

original: de nang padmo stong 'dab la //
analyzed: de nang padmo stong 'dab la //
translated: within which is a thousand-petaled lotus,

original: bskal bzangs sangs rgyas brgya phrag bcu //
analyzed: bskal bzangs sangs rgyas brgya phrag bcu //
translated: with ten sets of a hundred buddhas of the fortunate eon,

original: lte ba padmo can nyid de //
analyzed: lte ba padmo can nyid de //
translated: the navel is the very lotus,

original: de snying rdo rje 'dzin pa yin //
analyzed: de snying rdo rje 'dzin pa yin //
translated: and in its center is Vajradhara.

original: de yi thugs ni ye shes che //
analyzed: de yi thugs ni ye shes che //
translated: His mind is great wisdom,

original: gnyis med thig le dkar 'tsher ro //
analyzed: gnyis med thig le dkar 'tsher ro //
translated: the non-dual white-shining drop.

original: aom a'a: hr'i:h'um phata sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: hr'i:h'um phata sv'a h'a /
translated: Om Ah Hrih Hum Phat Svaha.

original: g-yas dang g-yon lag mgo bo dang ni de bzhin rkang //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon lag mgo bo dang ni de bzhin rkang //
translated: The head and feet are in the right and left hands,

original: g-yas g-yon rdo rje yan lag bzhi la go rims bzhin //
analyzed: g-yas g-yon rdo rje yan lag bzhi la go rims bzhin //
translated: the vajra limbs in the right and left, in sequence.

original: zla mdog me dang nam mkha' aindra dang // mar me'i dud mdog gnas drug ngag gi bdag nyid bsam //
analyzed: zla mdog me dang nam mkha' aindra dang // mar me'i dud mdog gnas drug ngag gi bdag nyid bsam //
translated: The moon-colored, fire, space, Indra, and lamp-smoke colors are in the six places, imagined as the nature of speech.ğŸ”½Jham Bam Vam Ho.

original: dza:h'um bam ho:/ ji bzhin ye shes gzug pa yi //
analyzed: dza:h'um bam ho:/ ji bzhin ye shes gzug pa yi //
translated: By the instructions of the visualization of the wisdom deity as it is,

original: man ngag gis ni lha bcings la //
analyzed: man ngag gis ni lha bcings la //
translated: the deity is bound.

original: rnal 'byor mu khyud bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mu khyud bzlas pa yis //
translated: By the repetition of the yoga garland,

original: dpal phreng gsum gyi sngags ring brjod //
analyzed: dpal phreng gsum gyi sngags ring brjod //
translated: Recite the long mantra of the three glorious garlands.

original: sna tshogs kha dog can 'od zer //
analyzed: sna tshogs kha dog can 'od zer //

original: de bzhin dkar dang dmar ba nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin dkar dang dmar ba nyid //

original: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //

original: don gsum rtag tu bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: don gsum rtag tu bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: should always be accomplished for the three purposes.

original: rnam dag ye shes thig le las byung bde ba'i rgyun gyis bla ma dang // de las kyang 'phros padma 'dzin sku shel ltar rab dang rab tu gang //
analyzed: rnam dag ye shes thig le las byung bde ba'i rgyun gyis bla ma dang // de las kyang 'phros padma 'dzin sku shel ltar rab dang rab tu gang //
translated: The guru, arisen from the bindu of pure gnosis, is filled again and again with the stream of bliss from the lotus holder, whose body is like crystal.
